group_1.narration: Momoko, Rena, and I came to the beach to play!

group_1.textLeft: The banana boat was really fun!

group_1.textRight: Is that so... I’m glad you think so...
(It took everything in me to keep myself from falling off...)

group_1.textLeft: Maybe we should go again!

group_1.textRight: I-I think I’m done with that, but if you guys wanna@ride again, you can do it together.

group_1.textLeft: Eh, umm...
If you don't want to do that, then why don't we try something else?
We've come all the way here, so I really want to find things we can all do together.
Yeah, exactly.
If it’s not going to be the three of us, then what’s the point?

group_1.textRight: Kaede... Rena...

group_1.textLeft: Hmm… [chara:100951:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:100951:cheek_0][chara:100951:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json][chara:100951:motion_100][chara:100951:lipSynch_1]I know, let’s play beach volleyball next!

group_1.textRight: Rena… That could be fun, but can we play it with@just the three of us?
You've... never watched beach volleyball before,@have you, Rena?

group_1.textLeft: Rrrgh...
Th-then why don’t we split a watermelon?

group_1.textRight: Do we have the tools with us?@Or a watermelon...?

group_1.textLeft: ...Well, no, but...
We can just buy all those things instead!@Let's do it!

group_1.textRight: But watermelons are pretty expensive, aren't they?
Didn’t you know that, Rena...?
I should’ve brought one of the watermelons I picked from our garden...

group_1.textLeft: Rrrrrgh...

group_1.textRight: Hmm… What can the three of us do together?
Oh, I got it, I got it!@How about we go searching for sea life?

group_1.textLeft: Huh?
Why? What's the point of that?

group_1.textRight: It’s because sea creatures are so interesting,
and there are a lot of really cute ones, too!
Wait a second...
See, [chara:101150:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:101150:cheek_0][chara:101150:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json:motion_200][chara:101150:lipSynch_1]look! That's a hermit crab!
Oh...
It's tiny! And the way it’s crawling along is@surprisingly cute.
I could watch this forever.

group_1.textLeft: Urrggh...

group_1.textRight: There’s more!
Look! That's a starfish!

group_1.textLeft: [chara:100951:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]A starfish?!

group_1.textRight: Yeah! I'm gonna go get it!
Check it out! Rena, look!

group_1.textLeft: Hey, quit it!@Don't show me that side!
It's way too gross!

group_1.textRight: It's not gross!
Here, go ahead and touch it, Rena.

group_1.textLeft: What?!@It's huge! Yuck!

group_1.textRight: Jeez… You can’t even touch a starfish, Rena?

group_1.textLeft: Nope, I’m pretty sure I can’t!
Hey, stop that!

group_1.textRight: Come on, give me your hand!

group_1.textLeft: S-stop it! I’m telling you to stooop!

group_1.textRight: Ah! No! What are you doing?

group_1.textLeft: Stay away from meee!!

group_1.textRight: [chara:101150:effect_shake]D-don’t pull on me!

group_1.textLeft: I’m trying not to! There's something stuck in my…@[chara:100951:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:100951:cheek_1][chara:100951:face_mtn_ex_050.exp.json:motion_201][chara:100951:lipSynch_1]Wh-whaaaaat?!

group_1.textRight: [flashEffect:flashRed2][bhEffect:shakeSmall][se:3001_chara_damage]Bwaaaaah?!
Rena… That thing you're holding in your hand...

group_1.textLeft: I… [chara:100951:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:100951:cheek_1][chara:100951:face_mtn_ex_020.exp.json:motion_201][chara:100951:lipSynch_1]I didn’t mean to, I swear!
